name: ROCKETS FUCKING EVERYWHERE
description:
[Latest version: R4]

ROCKETS FUCKING EVERYWHERE is a top-down bullet-hellish dodge-em-up with vicious...erm...viciousness. Travel and explode entertainingly in over five stages while listening to the awesome chiprock tracks by Graham 'Pitfall' Baker.

Professionals recommend that you do not take the content inside this game seriously, and that if at any time you feel offended, just know it isn't personal.

Supported Operating Systems: Windows, OSX, and Linux (32-bit and 64-bit downloads)
